Rachel Shand 2015-02-24T12:09:31+00:00 2015-02-24T12:09:31+00:00 Beyond Partition - Gender, Violence and Representation in Postcolonial India https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=GENDER-VIOLENCE-RESEARCH;cd488768.1502 Dear GENDER-VIOLENCE-RESEARCH Subscribers,<br><br>We hope the following titles will be of interest to you.<br><br>[Beyond Partition]<http://www.combinedacademic.co.uk/beyond-partition>Beyond Partition<http://www.combinedacademic.co.uk/beyond-partition><br><br>Gender, Violence and Representation in Postcolonial India<br>Deepti Misri<br>"An original and engaging piece of scholarship. It ranges widely and easily across materials in many genres and disciplines; it demonstrates a very fine eye for the telling textual detail; in a field vulnerable to sentimentality, it is clear-eyed and willing to pose uncomfortable questions; and it is written with verve and force."-Parama Roy, University of California, Davis<br>In Beyond Partition, Deepti Misri shows how 1947 marked the beginning of a history of politicized [...] Lynn Sardinha 2015-02-23T16:23:22+00:00 2015-02-23T16:23:22+00:00 Fwd: FW: Next Link services under threat https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=GENDER-VIOLENCE-RESEARCH;2caab29d.1502 Dear All,<br>Next Link is a vital DVA service in Bristol and is under threat.
